content:
802 
 
 
    Accepts ND merit in Social Work/Development and 
Administration, plus UTME requirements.  
  
UTME  
(i) EBSU requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, History/Government/Economics one science 
subject and any Arts or Social Science subject.  
(ii) OAU requires English Language, Mathematics and at least 
two (2) Social Science and one Arts subject.   
(iii) UYO requires at least 'O' level pass in Mathematics  
(iv) UNIZIK requires Five (5) 'O' level credits passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics and any other three (3) 
Arts/Social Science subjects  
(v) IMSU requires 'O' level pass in Mathematics  
(vi) UNN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes which must 
include English Language, one Science subject, and at least 
three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.  
(vii) ESUTECH requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Government and any t wo (2) Arts or Social 
Science subjects.  
(viii) BENIN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics and any two (2) Social 
Science subjects.  
(ix) BSU accepts five (5) 'O' level credit passes from any Social 
Science or Arts subjects.  
(x) BIU same as in Political Science.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) BENIN accepts two (2) Social Science subjects and any other 
subject.  
(ii) OAU requires English Language, Mathematics, and any two 
(2) from Literature in English, Geography, Christian 
Religious Studies/ Islamic Studies/Government, History, 
Economics.  
(iii) EBSU requires Government/History plus two (2) other social 
science/Arts subjects.  
(iv) ESUTECH requires Government.
